name: Kids Dish Washing and Cleaning Game - Free Fun Kitchen Games for Girls,Kids and Boys
name_original: Kids Dish Washing and Cleaning Game - Free Fun Kitchen Games for Girls,Kids and Boys
description:
Help your Mom in Kitchen. Wash all Plates, Cups, Dishes with hot water and great lemon max soap and kill all those germs and shine to keep your Mom happy!

Key Features:

1. Exciting tools to wash dishes.
2. Four Different Exciting Scenes.
3. Awesome Sounds and Music.
4. Kill Germs Scene.
5. Very Easy to play with guide.

Download and Play today!

Thanks for playing!
